To display the music visualization the 'Record audio' permission is needed.
This permission can be denied or allowed at any time via system settings:
Apps -> Menu -> 'Show system' -> Music -> Permissions.
Click on 'Cancel' to disable the music visualization,
(the permission won't be changed).
\'Record audio\' permission denied, music visualization disabled.
